What does it mean?

The product contains materials derived only from living animals. It was not tested on animals. Only compounds based on selected and non-hazardous substances were used as preservatives.

Benefits

The label guarantees that the product does not contain: - Genetically Modified Organisms (GMOs) - substances obtained from the distillation of crude oil - PEG emulsifiers - synthetic odoriferous substances and colouring matters. Ecocert warrants also that the product packaging is designed in an environmentally friendly manner.

Where to find

The label can be found mainly on cosmetics and food products and waste generated after the use of these products.
